A space for curious writers to frictionlessly display words.

Welcome to The Lotus Seed (tis.volvox.ink), a sanctuary for writers who believe in the power of sharing ideas. Our platform was created with simplicity in mind—removing barriers between your thoughts and your audience.

Just as the lotus rises from murky waters to bloom in magnificent beauty, we believe that every writer's voice deserves to emerge and be appreciated, regardless of where they are in their creative journey.

Main

Our primary publication space for more polished, refined works. This is where you'll find carefully crafted pieces that have undergone thoughtful revision and editing.

Secondary

A judgment-free zone for immediacy and raw expression. When you just need to get your words out without worrying about perfection, this is your space.

Access Information

At the moment there is just one password that facilitates adding, deleting and editing entries. You can get this access by simply asking someone who already has the password. Try these one of these people:

Contact Information

  • Administrator 1: 555-123-4567
  • Administrator 2: 555-234-5678
  • Administrator 3: 555-345-6789
  • Editorial Team: editors@lotusseed.com

Platform Structure

The Lotus Seed is designed with flexibility in mind. While our Main and Secondary publications form the core of our platform, we embrace expansion and personalization:

Customizable Sub-pages: Additional publication spaces can be created through the /admin panel. Currently, we have an Alternative page that showcases experimental writing formats.

Personal & Group Spaces: If you desire a dedicated space for your individual work or for a writing collective, please reach out to one of our administrators. We're happy to set up customized sub-pages that meet your specific needs.

The Inspiration: Volvox

A volvox is a remarkable form of multicellular green algae that exemplifies the power of collective existence. Volvox colonies consist of thousands of cells working in harmony, forming elegant spherical structures that move with grace through freshwater environments.

Much like how each Volvox cell contributes to the whole while maintaining its unique purpose, our writers maintain their individual voices while contributing to a common pursuit.
